price: Kandi isi izarabagirana biturutse ku rumuri rwa Nyagasani wayo, nuko buri wese ahabwe igitabo (cy’ibikorwa bye), hanyuma abahanuzi n’abahamya bazanwe, maze (abantu) bacirwe urubanza mu kuri, batarenganyijwe.
arabic: وَأَشۡرَقَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ وَجِاْيٓءَ بِٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءِ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-ashraqati al-arḍu binūri rabbihā wawuḍiʿa al-kitābu wajīa bil-nabiyīna wal-shuhadāi waquḍiya baynahum bil-ḥaqi wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
